channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dangerous road surface, 19th June
item.description:
From the top of the hill by the junction down wards for 300 metres the road has broken up to such an extent that it is becoming unusuable for both bikes and cars The road is in a terrible state with numerous pot holes, I used the term road generously! It is no longer safe to cycle on as it has become too dangerous, someone will have a serious accident due to the neglect of the road. I see that this has been reported previously but cannot see any evidence of remedial work or risk mitigation.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dangerous water access (?), 18th June
item.description:
Your last response (reference 11367956) is unacceptable. We actually saw him come out and he jumped on the grid in the road NOT the one I reported. As I said before elderly people live in this road and we watched a child come off her scooter last week whilst this had flipped up-someone could seriously injure themselves on this and it needs sorting.please REOPEN this case

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 16 Bushcombe Close, Woodmancote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Attention to trees, 18th June
item.description:
The fence line with Parton Manor school requires urgent attention. The trees are already blocking the path and the height of the trees causes concern. Especially during inclement weather when branches have fallen. I know this has also been reported to Churchdown Housing Management Company. They tell me they have contacted the school on several occasions about the matter but they have not even responded to the requests. A matter of concern for those pedestrians, including school children, who are frequent users of the path.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 91 Golden Vale, Churchdown
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3 Large Derp Potholes, 17th June
item.description:
There are 3 potholes that you cannot avoid because the road is single track. If you are running or on a bike it is a dangerous hazard. They are getting bigger and potentially damage your car because you can’t dodge them

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elkstone
Report on FixMyStreet
